item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Biden allows Ukraine to strike Russia with US-made long-range missiles
2. Trump expands search for Treasury secretary
3. [Opinion] What to expect from the markets under Trump
4. [Opinion] Trump’s victory represents a historic protest vote, no more and no less
5. Top UK government lawyer calls for ‘revolving door’ with industry as pay gap widens
